channel.title: Comments on: Meme Monday for December
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: :) Thanks, Jen. I almost wish they'd slow down on the growing up part. It goes so fast :(
item.content:encoded: üôÇ Thanks, Jen. I almost wish they’d slow down on the growing up part. It goes so fast üôÅ

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: My youngest son will be 8 tomorrow.

item.title: By: Jen McCown
item.dc:creator: Jen McCown
item.content:encoded:
My youngest (my boy Benny) just turned four on Saturday, so I’m carrying around the same warm fuzzies…awesome-family-high-fives!

And I like the idea of asking Microsoft to remember the big picture in addition to the Next Shiny Thing…
